name: packing-tracking
description: A project to keep track of what item is in what box while moving.

scripts.hasura-console-prod: URL=$(grep URL .env | cut -d '=' -f2) && cd hasura && ls && hasura console --endpoint "https://graphql.$URL" --admin-secret "$(npm run --silent get-hasura-admin-secret-prod)"
scripts.apply-hasura-migrations-prod: URL=$(grep URL .env | cut -d '=' -f2) && cd ./hasura && hasura migrate apply --endpoint "https://graphql.$URL" --admin-secret "$(npm run --silent get-hasura-admin-secret-prod)"
scripts.apply-hasura-metadata-prod: URL=$(grep URL .env | cut -d '=' -f2) && cd ./hasura && hasura metadata apply --endpoint "https://graphql.$URL" --admin-secret "$(npm run --silent get-hasura-admin-secret-prod)"
scripts.get-hasura-admin-secret-prod: STAGE=$(grep STAGE .env | cut -d '=' -f2) && echo "$(aws secretsmanager get-secret-value --secret-id $STAGE-PackingTracking-HasuraGraphqlAdminSecret | jq -r '.SecretString')"

author: Stefan M. Feltmann
